component.name: DESEq2
component.doc: Differential gene expression analysis with DESeq2
component.author: Christian Frech

input.name: counts
input.doc: Array containing names of read count files.

parameter.name: controlGroup
parameter.doc: Name of control group. Group must be defined in 'sampleGroups' input file.

parameter.name: caseGroup
parameter.doc: Name of case group. Group must be defined in 'sampleGroups' input file.

parameter.name: otherGroups
parameter.doc: Comma-separated list of additional sample groups to model. All groups must be defined in 'sampleGroups' input file.

parameter.name: design
parameter.doc: Design formula used in DESeqDataSetFromHTSeqCount command. All variables except 'group' need to be present as data columns in the 'samples' input table. 'group' is a special factor variable automatically provided by the component that contains group assignments according to the 'sampleGroups' input data.

parameter.name: label
parameter.doc: Name of comparison. Will be appended to column names of output table to make them unique.

parameter.name: minReplicatesForReplace
parameter.doc: The minimum number of replicates required in order to replace outliers in a sample. If there are samples with so many replicates, the model will be refit after replacing these outliers, flagged by Cookâ€™s distance. Set to 0 in order to never replace outliers.
